928dfb58-33b9-4b28-9e62-fd3e6c679848.description: Earners of the CPA – C++ Certified Associate Programmer badge demonstrate the ability to accomplish coding tasks related to the basics of programming in the C++ language, and the fundamental notions and techniques used in object-oriented programming.
928dfb58-33b9-4b28-9e62-fd3e6c679848.name: [CPA-21-01] CPA – C++ Certified Associate Programmer

alignments.name: CPA: Exam Syllabus
alignments.description: A test candidate should demonstrate sufficient knowledge of the syntax and semantics of the C++ language, data types, the principles of the object-oriented model and its implementation in the C++ language, the means useful in resolving typical implementation problems with the help of standard C++ language libraries, and writing C++ programs.

alignments.name: CPA: Testing Policies
alignments.description: OpenEDG C++ Institute Test Candidates can register and take the CPA exam through the Network of Pearson VUE Testing Centers. The exam should be scheduled at least one full business day (24 hours) in advance. More information: www.pearsonvue.com/cppinstitute

23f39fbb-3f19-4189-b13a-cafa8ae4ab0c.description: Earners of the CLA – C Certified Associate Programmer badge demonstrate the ability to accomplish coding tasks related to the basics of programming in the C programming language, as well as fundamental programming techniques, customs and vocabulary, including the most common library functions and the usage of the preprocessor.
23f39fbb-3f19-4189-b13a-cafa8ae4ab0c.name: [CLA-11-02] CLA – C Certified Associate Programmer

alignments.name: CLA: Exam Syllabus
alignments.description: A test candidate should demonstrate sufficient knowledge of the universal concepts of computer programming, developer tools, the syntax and semantics of the C language, data types offered by the C language, and writing programs using standard language infrastructure regardless of the hardware or software platform.

alignments.name: CLA: Testing Policies
alignments.description: OpenEDG C++ Institute Test Candidates can register and take the CLA exam through the Network of Pearson VUE Testing Centers. The exam should be scheduled at least one full business day (24 hours) in advance. More information: www.pearsonvue.com/cppinstitute

badge_template_activities.title: Achieve a passing score on the CLA – C Certified Associate Programmer certification exam

95124bb7-d44a-4a50-bdc2-9dd6a205a30b.description: Earners of the CPE – C++ Certified Entry-Level Programmer certification have knowledge of the universal concepts of computer programming such as compilation, variables, data types, typecasting, operators, conditional execution, loops, arrays, pointers, memory management, functions, and the runtime environment; the syntax and semantics of the C++ language, as well as demonstrate the ability to accomplish coding tasks related to the essentials of programming in the C++ language.
95124bb7-d44a-4a50-bdc2-9dd6a205a30b.name: [CPE-20-01] CPE – C++ Certified Entry-Level Programmer

alignments.name: CPE: Testing Policies
alignments.description: OpenEDG C++ Institute Test Candidates can register and take the CPE exam online via the OpenEDG Testing Service Platform available at https://edube.org. OpenEDG C++ Institute CPE exam sessions do not need to be scheduled in advance - test candidates can register for and take exams on the same day.

badge_template_activities.title: Achieve a passing score on the CPE – C++ Certified Entry-Level Programmer certification exam

57bf8133-5753-4f9a-8a29-b18faa4faad7.description: Earners of the CLE – C Certified Entry-Level Programmer certification have knowledge of the universal concepts of computer programming such as compilation, variables, data types, typecasting, operators, conditional execution, loops, arrays, pointers, memory management, functions, and the runtime environment; the syntax and semantics of the C language, as well as demonstrate the ability to accomplish coding tasks related to the essentials of programming in the C language.
57bf8133-5753-4f9a-8a29-b18faa4faad7.name: [CLE-10-01] CLE – C Certified Entry-Level Programmer

badge_template_activities.title: Achieve a passing score on the CLE – C Certified Entry-Level Programmer certification exam

908edd20-c8fd-4b7e-9ea3-9779dc7e33f4.description: Earners of the CPP – C++ Certified Professional Programmer badge demonstrate the ability to accomplish coding tasks related to the more advanced C++ topics such as templates and the Standard Template Library.
908edd20-c8fd-4b7e-9ea3-9779dc7e33f4.name: [CPP-22-02] CPP – C++ Certified Professional Programmer

alignments.name: CPP: Exam Syllabus
alignments.description: A test candidate should demonstrate sufficient knowledge of the C++ template mechanism, reading and understanding definitions of template functions and classes, creating and using template classes and methods; C++ STL, including the I/O section, and solving common programming problems with STL-predefined classes and methods.

alignments.name: CPP: Testing Policies
alignments.description: OpenEDG C++ Institute Test Candidates can register and take the CPP exam through the Network of Pearson VUE Testing Centers. The exam should be scheduled at least one full business day (24 hours) in advance. More information: www.pearsonvue.com/cppinstitute
